ygData.subject: new guild and new server?
ygData.msgSnippet: Role player seeks serious adventuring partners. Role player is honest, industrious and looks out for groupmates (and prefers to play a bard). Seeking a guild
ygData.messageBody:
Role player seeks serious adventuring partners.

Role player is honest, industrious and looks out for
groupmates (and prefers to play a bard).

Seeking a guild (on any server) that has a reasonable
number of serious minded adult players. Said role
player is NOT looking to be twinked, power leveled or
otherwise given favors, just looking for mature
players to run with on a regular basis.

__________________________________________________
